adjectives.description: devotional (comparative more devotional, superlative most devotional)

entries.meaning: (usually religious) Of or pertaining to devotion or worship.
examples: She spent much time playing devotional music.
To prepare for leading a devotional, select a theme appropriate to the occasion.

entries.meaning: A text or piece of music or writing to be used for devotion.
examples: Each page of the book offers a short devotional that inspires thought and self-reflection.
